name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary: Senior JavaScript Engineer with 10+ years of experience specializing in modern web development technologies. Highly proficient in **JavaScript**, **TypeScript**, **React**, **Vue.js**, **HTML5**, **CSS3**, SASS, LESS, and utilizing tools such as **Webpack**, **Gulp**, and **jQuery** for building high-performance applications. Experienced in implementing **microservices** architecture to enhance scalability and maintainability in applications. Demonstrated expertise in real-time analytics, utilizing **Git** for version control and collaboration. Proven track record of delivering efficient solutions that meet industry standards and compliance requirements. Skilled at leveraging my extensive background in full-stack development, including proficiency in **Node.js**, to create seamless user experiences and robust applications. Passionate about fostering innovation and driving impactful results through technology.
